      • createFile

        @PostMapping("/create")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> createFile​(@RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                            java.lang.String fileContent)
        Creates a file in the storage
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be created
        fileContent - content of the file to be created
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 when the file is created, 500 if there was a server error, 400 if the request is not correct

      • readFile

        @GetMapping("/read")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> readFile​(@RequestParam
                                                                          java.lang.String fileName)
        Returns the content of the file identified by the provided fileName parameter
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 when the content can be read, 500 if there was a server error, 400 if the request is not correct

      • updateFile

        @PutMapping("/update")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> updateFile​(@RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                            java.lang.String newContent)
        Updates the content of the file identified by the fileName parameter, appending the new content to the existing one
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be updated
        newContent - additional content to be appended to the existing file content
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 when the file's content is updated, 500 if there was a server error, 400 if the request is not correct

      • deleteFile

        @DeleteMapping("/delete")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> deleteFile​(@RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String fileName)
        Deletes a file in the storage identified by the fileName parameter
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file to be deleted
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 when the file is deleted, 500 if there was a server error, 400 if the request is not correct

      • listAllFiles

        @GetMapping("/enumeration")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> listAllFiles​(@RequestParam
                                                                              java.lang.String namePattern)
        Returns the files in the storage filtered by a provided file name pattern
        Parameters:
        namePattern - pattern used to filter files
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 when the list can be created, 500 if there was a server error

      • countNumberOfFiles

        @GetMapping("/size")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> countNumberOfFiles()
        Returns the number of files available in the storage
        Returns:
        HTTP status 200 and the number of files stored or HTTP status 500 when error is encountered
